Welcome to my little corner of the internet, where I share my passion for electronics, programming, robotics, and spaceâ€”basically, all things tech and beyond! ðŸš€ But itâ€™s not just about circuits and codeâ€”expect some delicious cooking recipes, coffee adventures, and travel stories along the way. After all, great ideas (and great robots) run on good food, strong coffee, and a bit of exploration.

Whether you’re here to tinker with hardware, dive into software, explore the cosmos, or discover new flavors and places, I hope you find inspiration and something new to learn.

item.title: About
item.description:
Welcome to my corner of the web!

I’m passionate about robotics, artificial intelligence, and rocketryâ€”pushing the boundaries of what’s possible and imagining the future. By day, I’m a developer and firmware engineer, turning ideas into tangible solutions and navigating the world of embedded systems. I’m also a proud father, balancing the joys of parenthood with a career in tech.

By night, I’m a maker at heart. You’ll often find me tinkering with new ideas, diving into hands-on projects, and exploring creative ways to bring concepts to life. Whether it’s designing the next robotics prototype, experimenting with AI algorithms, or dreaming up rocketry innovations, my mind is always buzzing with possibilities.
